abstract: The long-running securities fraud lawsuit relates to a lending business that the British bank acquired in the United States a decade ago.
snippet: The long-running securities fraud lawsuit relates to a lending business that the British bank acquired in the United States a decade ago.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — HSBC Group said Friday that it would appeal yet again a $2.46 billion judgment in a long-running securities fraud lawsuit in the United States related to a consumer-loan and credit-card business that the British bank acquired more than a decade ago.
